name: Slimes stole my Coins
description:
Pesky slimes stole all your coins! And they are having fun, protected by the King itself!

Go take your money back!

And with the money you get remember to power up your abilites so you can defeat the Slime King once and for all. 

Made for the #SpeedJam #1  with theme THIEVERY. The goal is make a speedrunnable game.

Coded by myself in Godot

Art and Sounds credits:
